entry.title: Free Shipping for orders over $50
entry.content: We are now offering free shipping for orders over $50 CDN before taxes.

entry.title: New Website coming soon
entry.content: Splitz will be launching a new look in the next few weeks.  In honor of our new site this week we are featuring pink.  The tulips are up and spring is almost here.  Look for the amazing prices on our printed pink bodysuits.  Follow us on Facebook and Twitter for more news.

entry.title: Men's and Boys' Gymnastics Apparel has arrived.
entry.content: Our Men's and Boy's collection has arrived. We have more great colours on the way. Email if you would like a personal design. Singlets, Shorts, and Longs are all available. Men's sizing chart will be added this weekend.

entry.title: Keep in Touch
entry.content: Want to keep up with the latest news?  Use the links on the bottom of our homepage to like us on Facebook and follow us on Twitter.  We are also on Instagram @splitz_ca

entry.title: Run, Walk, Cycle, Ski, or Skate in style this spring.
entry.content: Check out our new high performance headbands which are perfect for keeping your ears warm during spring outdoor activities. Run, walk, cycle, ski, or skate in style. Look great while staying active outdoors. See our Outdoor collection for all our latest styles and colours.

entry.title: Beasejour Competition
entry.content: Congratulations to all the athletes that competed yesterday in the Beasejour Competition. There were great performances all around and the athletes were a pleasure to watch. Way to go girls.

entry.title: Men's and Boys Practice and Competition Items
entry.content: Coming soon ! Men's and Boys practice and competition singlets, shorts, and longs. Check back soon to see the new looks..

entry.title: Matching Doll Bodysuits for your athletes
entry.content: Splitz now features bodysuits that fit 18 inch dolls such as Maplelea, American Girl and more. Our Black with lime star bodysuit was one of the Splitz original competitive bodysuits that can be seen in the American Girl Movie. Follow us on instagram at splitz_ca to keep up with new products and Splitz news.

entry.title: Our shop kitten at work
entry.content: Stella fell asleep while helping to cut the bodysuits for the Eastman athletes fro Manitoba Winter Games 2014.  Check out the photo at www.facebook.com/splitz.ca

entry.title: Outdoor Winter Accessories
entry.content: Hi! We have added a new winter accessory called Banana Bands! Banana Bands are high performance head bands made for outdoor activities like cycling, running, skiing, and many more. They come in a variety of different colours. Check them out at www.splitz.ca

entry.title: Velour Bodysuit Sale
entry.content:
Hello All!

We have a great promotion going on right now on our velour body suits! buy 1 get 1 free in store and online. If you are shopping online email us at sales@splitz.ca to get the velour bodysuit sale promotion code.

entry.title: Gymnastics Season Well under way
entry.content: The new gymnastic season is well underway. We have lots of great dance and gymnastic leotards! We have several leotards on sale right now in the clearance section. We have been filling a lot of custom orders lately. check us out online at www.splitz.ca and contact us with any questions you have regarding custom orders or anything else regarding our products.

entry.title: Clearance Bodysuits
entry.content: Hello! We have printed bodysuits on sale in clearance that are 30$ for open back printed suits and 25$ for non-open back suits. check it out www.splitz.ca

entry.title: Social Media!
entry.content: Hello! We have been busy over here, we now have over a hundred new styles that have been uploaded onto our Splitz website (www.splitz.ca) over the past few weeks! We are happy to announce that we are now on Facebook, Twitter and Instagram (splitz_ca) add and follow us for the updates on promotions and whats up & coming!

entry.title: 20 NEW SUITS
entry.content: Over the last couple days we have added 20 new bodysuits!!! We are so excited to present all these new styles to our current and future customers!! There are many more Bodysuits to be uploaded!! So keep checking the website (www.splitz.ca) It is almost that time of year again, back to school is right around the corner! No better way to start a new season off then with a new bodysuit for the new gymnastics season!

entry.title: 5 new suits In many different styles
entry.content: 5 New gymnastic bodysuits added today!! Take a look on our website (www.splitz.ca) all of our suits are uniquely styled and come in many diffferent sizes!!

entry.title: New Suits
entry.content: New suits are being added daily!! Keep your eyes open we have various sizes and styles that are perfect for practice and competition! We even do custom work as well! So if you're looking for a new suit for the new season I am positive we will have something to meet your specific needs in a new suit!

entry.title: Back to School
entry.content: Get ready for back to school with our new training bodysuits.  Check the website daily to see the newest featured designs.

entry.title: Westerns May 2-4, 2013
entry.content: We are set up at floor level at the Western Canadian Gymnastics Competition at the Max Bell Centre at the University of Manitoba.  Drop in and say hi thie weekend. We have a great view of the competition.

entry.title: Splitz at the Western Canadian Gymnastics Championships
entry.content:
Splitz will be at the Western Canadian Gymnastics Championships May 2-4, 2013 at the University of Manitoba Max Bell Center.  We will have a fabulous collection of one of a kind event finals bodysuits as well as our practice suits and gymnastics shorts available for sale at our "pop-up" store.  Drop by and see the athletes compete, visit with our staff, and see our new creations.  See you there.


Follow us on Facebook at www.facebook.com/splitz.ca
